Author: Torjus Bjåen
Message:
Remove restriction of typesVersion to 4.7 (#2078)

Newer versions of TypeScript would not pick up the types when importing from `photoswipe/lightbox` as the types were restricted to version 4.7 or lower.

The types works perfectly fine with newer versions of TS, so by simply removing the restriction everything works as expected.

fixes dimsemenov/PhotoSwipe#2029

Author: Ivan Rudoy
Message:
Implement type definitions generation via JSDoc comments (#1913)

Introduce type definitions for the PhotoSwipe:

* add tsconfig.json

* add types for util/util.js

* increase the `max-len` eslint rule value for comments

* add type definitions for eventable, photoswipe and utils

* emit type definitions

* add type definitions for photoswipe, scroll-wheel, slide and utils

* enable class properties in eslint

* add global declarations file

* add type definitions for ui-element

* improve `createElement` util type

* add type definitions for ui

* add types for base, keyboard, opener, slide/*

* add types for gestures, main-scroll

* add types for lightbox

* expose SlideData from photoswipe; fix ui type

* fix pswpModule types

* remove types from gitignore

* set package exports

* add types for events/filters

* fix types for animations

* add `false` to types showAnimationDuration, zoomAnimationDuration and actions

* allow adding an arbitrary props to the Content

* make dataSource optional for lightbox.loadAndOpen method

* change type for linkEl to HTMLAnchorElement

* hoist Actions type definition

* fix DataSource type for lightbox

* fix lazyLoadData and lazyLoadSlide types

* fix types for event mapping in lightbox

* add type for ItemHolder

* fix LoadState type

* add comments to SlideData props

* move comments to class declarations

* expose PhotoSwipeEventsMap, PhotoSwipeFiltersMap, EventCallback, AugmentedEvent

* add .editorconfig

Author: Dmitry Semenov
Message:
Drop built-in import() support for pswpModule

Despite tries, some bundlers try to transpile dynamic import within PhotoSwipe, which leads to errors and just inconvenience. Syntax pswpModule: "path/to/photoswipe.js" is no longer supported.

Use either this (if you need dynamic import):

pswpModule: () => import('path/to/photoswipe.js')

or:

import PhotoSwipe from 'path/to/photoswipe.js';

and then:

pswpModule: PhotoSwipe
